title: Did David Hugg offer the first and second amendments incompatibility?
subtitle: The survivors of the Parkland School shooting were opposed to the requirement to evacuate backpacks, but he had also repeatedly stated that he supported the second amendment.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: David Hogg stated that he believed that the forced use of a clean backpack at school constituted a violation of students ' rights in the first amendment, but preferred to abolish the second amendment.
